mapper.sql: ID, `NAME`, MAX_LEVEL, MIN_LEVEL, MAX_ONLINE, IS_NEW, MIN_FIGHTNUM, GAME_TYPE, MAX_TEAM_LEVEL, MIN_TEAM_LEVEL, SERVER_TYPE, `INDEX`, REMARK, PICTURE
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SERVER where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or `NAME` like '${searchValue}%' )
mapper.insert: insert into SERVER (ID, `NAME`, MAX_LEVEL, MIN_LEVEL, MAX_ONLINE, IS_NEW, MIN_FIGHTNUM, GAME_TYPE, MAX_TEAM_LEVEL, MIN_TEAM_LEVEL, SERVER_TYPE, `INDEX`, REMARK, PICTURE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isNew,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minFightnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gameType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxTeamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minTeamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serverType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{index,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.maxLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.minLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.maxOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isNew,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.minFightnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.gameType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.maxTeamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.minTeamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.serverType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.index,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update SERVER
`NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAX_LEVEL = #{maxLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MIN_LEVEL = #{minLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAX_ONLINE = #{maxOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
